snippet: Nazario Moreno González, a leader of a powerful criminal gang now known as the Knights Templar, was likely killed in a shootout with federal forces, Mexican officials said.
abstract: Nazario Moreno Gonzalez, Mexican drug kingpin presumed dead for over three years, dies in confrontation with military; officials publicly confirm his death.
lead_paragraph: Nazario Moreno González, a leader of a powerful criminal gang now known as the Knights Templar, was likely killed in a shootout with federal forces, Mexican officials said.

headline.main: Mexican Drug Lord, Thought Dead in 2010, Is Reported Killed
headline.print_headline: Drug Lord, Thought Dead in 2010, Is Reported Killed
